broadwick

Class LoggingFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.LoggingFacade

  • public final class LoggingFacade
extends Object
    Facade class to the underlying logger to allow the loggers to be configured programmatically.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String logFormatThreadMsg 
      private ch.qos.logback.classic.LoggerContext loggerContext 
      private ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger rootLogger 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggingFacade()
      Create the logging facade, by default adding a console logger to output logging info to the screen (console).

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggingFacade

        public LoggingFacade()
        Create the logging facade, by default adding a console logger to output logging info to the screen (console). A level of 'error' is configured by default, once the configuration file is read the logging level can be changed.

    • Method Detail

      • addConsoleLogger

        public void addConsoleLogger(String level,
                    String pattern)
        Add a console logger to the list of loggers of the project. This will replace all the console loggers already added using this method.
        Parameters:
        level - the logging level to be applied.
        pattern - the pattern for the logger.

      • addFileLogger

        public void addFileLogger(String file,
                 String level,
                 String pattern,
                 Boolean overwrite)
        Add a file logger to the list of loggers of the project.
        Parameters:
        file - the name of the file to which the logging messages will be added.
        level - the logging level to be applied.
        pattern - the pattern for the logger.
        overwrite - if true, the contents of any previous log are overwritten. If false, the logs are appended.

      • createPatternLayoutEncoder

        private ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.Encoder<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent> createPatternLayoutEncoder(String pattern)
        Create a pattern layout encoder for a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to apply.
        Returns:
        the created encoder.

      • createThresholdFilter

        private ch.qos.logback.core.filter.Filter<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent> createThresholdFilter(String level)
        Create a thresholdFilter for a given level.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to set.
        Returns:
        the created filter.

      • setLoggingLevel

        private void setLoggingLevel(String level)
        Convert the string passed as argument to a Level. If the conversion fails, then this method returns Level.DEBUG.
        Parameters:
        level - the logging level that should be used.
